title: António Amaral
text: António Jorge Rodrigues Amaral (born 20 June 1955 in <a href="Lisbon">Lisbon</a>) is a Portuguese former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> and <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a>.
